articles.title: India vs Japan, Asian Champions Trophy 2023 Live Updates: Harmanpreet Singh Scores Equaliser, India 1-1 Japan In 3rd Quarter - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India Vs Japan, Asian Champions Trophy 2023 Highlights: Harmanpreet Singh scored a goal as India played out a 1-1 draw against Japan at the Mayor Radhakrishnan Hockey Stadium in Chennai on Friday.
